channel.title: [pi] Yell wont work

item.title: [pi] Yell wont work
item.dc:creator: @Owner_satan Owner satan
item.description:
@Owner_satan wrote:

Try this code:

[code=java]if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”)) {
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];

						if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOURNAMEHERE")){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=16715776>[Main Owner]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						} else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOURHEADMODSNAMEHERE")){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=14024959>[Head Mod]</col><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						} else if (c.playerRights == 4){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=6081134>[Donator]</col><img=0>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 1){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=5789784>[Mod]</col><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 2){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=16711680>[Admin]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");			
						}else if (c.playerRights == 3){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=5832448>[CO-Owner]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 0){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Player]</col>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                                                    
								
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}[/code]

item.title: [pi] Yell wont work
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

[code] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”)) {
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];

						if (Connection.isMuted(c)){
							c.sendMessage("You're muted. Don't try to yell");
						} else {
						else if (c.playerRights == 1){
							c2.sendMessage("<col=800000000>[Mod]<img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"</col>");
						} else if (c.playerRights == 2){
							c2.sendMessage("<col=16733440>[Admin]<img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"</col>");
						} else if (c.playerRights == 3){
							c2.sendMessage("<col=6160534>[Owner]<img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"</col>");
						} else if (c.playerRights == 4){
							c2.sendMessage("<col=799997952>[Donator]<img=0>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"</col>");
						} else if (c.playerRights == 0){
							c.sendMessage("You must be a donator to yell.");
						}
					}
				}
			}
    		}

[/code]

That’s longer but will also work, maybe better for you to have more cutomisability.

item.title: [pi] Yell wont work
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

ultimateGodz:

help me instead of dissing…

I was writing you up a clean code now, so please, let me do what you asked.

[hr]

String[] yellTitle = { "Player", "Moderator", "Admin", "Owner", "Donator" }; if(playerCommand.startsWith("yell")) { for(Player p : Server.playerHandler.players) { if(p != null) { Client c = (Client) p; c.sendMessage("[" + yellTitle[c.playerRights] + "] " + c.playerName + ": " + playerCommand.substring(5)); } } }

Actually just found that, Not mine but works, Credit to Skyro from R-S

item.description:

                     if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell")) {
				/*
				*This is the sensor for the yell command
				*/
				String text = playerCommand.substring(5);
				String[] bad = {"chalreq", "duelreq", "tradereq", ". com", "c0m", 
						"org", "net", "biz", ". net", ". org", ". biz",

						".com", ".net", ".org", "no-ip", "****", "is gay", "****",
						"crap", "rubbish", ". com", ". serva", ". no-ip", ". net", ". biz"};
				for(int i = 0; i < bad.length; i++){

					}
				}

		if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell") && c.playerRights >= 0 ) {
